C_Cpp.clang_format_style: { BasedOnStyle: Microsoft, ColumnLimit: 80, AlignTrailingComments: true, AlignConsecutiveMacros: true, AlignAfterOpenBracket: AlwaysBreak, BinPackArguments: false, BinPackParameters: false, AllowAllArgumentsOnNextLine: true, AllowAllParametersOfDeclarationOnNextLine: true, AllowAllConstructorInitializersOnNextLine: true, ConstructorInitializerAllOnOneLineOrOnePerLine: true, SortIncludes: false}
